name: App
description: Defines an AWS OpsWorks app for an AWS OpsWorks stack. The app represents code that you want to run on an application server.

properties.name: AppSource
properties.description: Contains the information required to retrieve an app from a repository.

properties.name: Attributes
properties.description: One or more user-defined key-value pairs to be added to the stack attributes bag.

properties.name: Domains
properties.description: The app virtual host settings, with multiple domains separated by commas. For example, 'www.example.com, example.com'.

properties.name: EnableSsl
properties.description: Whether to enable SSL for this app.

properties.name: Environment
properties.description: The environment variables to associate with the AWS OpsWorks app.
properties.typeDescription: List of AWS OpsWorks App Environment

properties.name: Shortname
properties.description: The app short name, which is used internally by AWS OpsWorks and by Chef recipes.

properties.name: StackId
properties.description: The AWS OpsWorks stack ID that this app will be associated with.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The app type. Each supported type is associated with a particular layer. For more information, see CreateApp in the AWS OpsWorks API Reference.
